title: Ceyhelaya
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, International, Buffet, Juice bar, Take-out, Sri Lankan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. As of Feb 2014, the only Sri Lankan restaurant in Finland. All vegetarian curries are actually vegan. Also serves a various array of fresh fruit juices, ginger beers and other drinks. Carries and sells various Ayurvedic medicines and teas from Sri Lanka (owner is Sri Lankan). Atmosphere is calm. All furniture is handmade in Sri Lanka and imported to Finland. Be sure to take a look at the ceiling which is said to be beautiful.
